languages.text: {n}Инквизитор сухо прерывает воителя Всеотца:{/n} "Не надо говорить со мной так, господин. Смею напомнить, что ваше присутствие в Просторе — не одолжение мне, а возврат обещанного долга. Я не был столь надменен, когда вернул на Фенрис вашего... заблудившегося брата. Я не требовал кровавую виру за верных слуг, погибших в процессе его спасения. Я скрыл то, что могло повредить вашей чести. Почему у вашей благодарности столь ядовитый вкус?"

{n}The Inquisitor dryly interrupts the Allfather's warrior:{/n} "Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt? I was not so haughty when I returned your... lost brother... to Fenris. I did not demand recompense for my faithful servants who died saving him. I kept secret those details that could have damaged your honour. Why, then, does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор сухо прерывает воителя Всеотца:{/n} "Не надо говорить со мной так, господин. Смею напомнить, что ваше присутствие в Просторе — не одолжение мне, а возврат обещанного долга. Я не был столь надменен, когда вернул на Фенрис вашего... заблудившегося брата. Я не требовал кровавую виру за верных слуг, погибших в процессе его спасения. Я скрыл то, что могло повредить вашей чести. Почему у вашей благодарности столь ядовитый вкус?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor interrupts the Allfather's warrior dryly.{/n} "Don't talk to me like that, sir. Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me but the promised repayment of a debt. I wasn't as haughty when I brought your... lost brother back to Fenris. I didn't demand weregild for my faithful servants who had died saving him. I didn't disclose things that could damage your honour. Why does your gratitude taste of venom?"

{n}The Inquisitor interrupts the Allfather's warrior dryly.{/n} "Don't talk to me like that, sir. Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me but the promised repayment of a debt. I wasn't as haughty when I brought your... lost brother back to Fenris. I didn't demand weregild for my faithful servants who had died saving him. I didn't disclose things that could damage your honour. Why does your gratitude taste of venom?"

{n}The Inquisitor interrupts the Allfather's warrior dryly.{/n} "Don't talk to me like that, sir. Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt. I wasn't as haughty when I brought back to Fenris your... lost brother. I didn't demand weregild for my faithful servants who had died saving him. I didn't disclose things that could damage your honour. Why does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"

{n}The Inquisitor interrupts the Allfather's warrior dryly.{/n} "Don't talk to me like that, sir. Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt. I wasn't as haughty when I brought back to Fenris your... lost brother. I didn't demand weregild for my faithful servants who had died saving him. I didn't disclose things that could damage your honour. Why does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"

{n}The Inquisitor dryly interrupts the Allfather's warrior:{/n} "Do not speak to me thus, my lord. Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt? I was not so haughty when I returned your... lost brother... to Fenris. I did not demand a weregild for my faithful servants who died saving him. I kept secret those details that could have damaged your honour. Why, then, does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"

{n}The Inquisitor dryly interrupts the Allfather's warrior:{/n} "Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt? I was not so haughty when I returned your... lost brother... to Fenris. I did not demand recompense for my faithful servants who died saving him. I kept secret those details that could have damaged your honour. Why, then, does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"

languages.text: {n}大审判官以冷漠的语气打断了全父的这位战士。{/n}“请允许我提醒你，你之所以来到科罗努斯扩区，并不是因为对我伸出援手，而是为了偿还曾经欠我的人情，是这样吧？当我把你们那位……失落的兄弟……带到芬里斯的时候，我可没有像你这么傲慢。为了救他，我损失了好几位忠诚的仆人，我并没有索要任何赔偿，也没有泄露过任何可能会损害你们名节的细节。既然如此，你的感激之情为什么听起来这么不满？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor dryly interrupts the Allfather's warrior:{/n} "Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt? I was not so haughty when I returned your... lost brother... to Fenris. I did not demand recompense for my faithful servants who died saving him. I kept secret those details that could have damaged your honour. Why, then, does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长面无表情地打断了全父的这位战士。{/n}“别这么和我说话，大人。请允许我提醒你，你之所以来到科罗努斯扩区，并不是因为对我伸出援手，而是为了偿还曾经欠我的人情。当我把你们那位……失落的兄弟带到芬里斯的时候，我可没有像你这么傲慢。为了救他，我损失了好几位忠诚的仆人，我并没有索要任何赔偿，也没有泄露过任何可能会影响你们命运的事情，可你的感激之情为什么听起来这么不满？”

languages.text: {n}異端審問官は乾いた口調で、全知の父の戦士の話に割り込む。{/n}「あなたがエクスパンスにいるのは、私への厚意ではなく借りを返す為であることをお忘れかな？私はそれほど高慢でなかったはずだ。あなたの…死んだ兄弟を…フェンリスに返した時は。彼を救って死んだ私の忠実な召使いの為に、贖罪金さえ求めなかった。あなたの名誉に傷がつくような事は、一切言わなかった。それなのに、あなたは何故、恩を仇で返すのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor dryly interrupts the Allfather's warrior:{/n} "Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt? I was not so haughty when I returned your... lost brother... to Fenris. I did not demand recompense for my faithful servants who died saving him. I kept secret those details that could have damaged your honour. Why, then, does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官は乾いた口調で、全知の父の戦士の話に割り込む。{/n}「あなたがエクスパンスにいるのは、私への厚意ではなく借りを返す為であることをお忘れかな？私はそれほど高慢でなかったはずだ。あなたの…死んだ兄弟を…フェンリスに返した時は。彼を救って死んだ私の忠実な召使いの為に、贖罪金さえ求めなかった。あなたの名誉に傷がつくような事は、一切言わなかった。それなのに、あなたは何故、恩を仇で返すのか？」

languages.text: {n}El Inquisidor interrumpe al guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas.{/n} «¿Necesito recordarle que su presencia en la Extensión se debe al pago prometido de una deuda? Yo no fui tan arrogante cuando traje a su... hermano perdido... a Fenris. No exigí ningún pago por mis fieles sirvientes que murieron salvándolo. Guardé en secreto cualquier detalle que pudieran dañar su honor. Entonces, ¿por qué su gratitud tiene este sabor a veneno?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor dryly interrupts the Allfather's warrior:{/n} "Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt? I was not so haughty when I returned your... lost brother... to Fenris. I did not demand recompense for my faithful servants who died saving him. I kept secret those details that could have damaged your honour. Why, then, does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Inquisidor interrumpe al guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas.{/n} «No me hable así, señor. Le recuerdo que su existencia en la Extensión se debe al pago prometido de una deuda. Yo no fui tan arrogante cuando traje a tu hermano perdido de vuelta a Fenris. No exigí ningún pago por mis fieles sirvientes que murieron salvándolo. No revelé cosas que pudieran dañar su honor. ¿Por qué su gratitud tiene este sabor a veneno?».

languages.text: {n}Der Inquisitor unterbricht den Krieger des Allvaters trocken.{/n} "Darf ich es wagen, Euch daran zu erinnern, dass Eure Anwesenheit in der Ausdehnung kein Gefallen mir gegenüber ist, sondern die versprochene Begleichung einer Schuld? Ich war nicht derart hochnäsig, als ich Euren ... verlorenen Bruder ... zu Fenris zurückgebracht habe. Ich habe keine Entschädigung für meine treuen Diener verlangt, die bei seiner Rettung ums Leben gekommen sind. Ich habe die Details geheim gehalten, die Eurer Ehre hätten schaden können. Warum also schmeckt Eure Dankbarkeit so giftig?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor dryly interrupts the Allfather's warrior:{/n} "Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt? I was not so haughty when I returned your... lost brother... to Fenris. I did not demand recompense for my faithful servants who died saving him. I kept secret those details that could have damaged your honour. Why, then, does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Inquisitor unterbricht den Krieger des Allvaters trocken.{/n} "Sprecht nicht so mit mir, Sir. Darf ich es wagen, Euch daran zu erinnern, dass Eure Anwesenheit in der Ausdehnung kein Gefallen mir gegenüber ist, sondern die versprochene Begleichung einer Schuld? Ich war nicht so hochmütig, als ich Euren ... verlorenen Bruder zurück nach Fenris gebracht habe. Ich habe kein Wergeld für meine treuen Diener verlangt, die bei seiner Rettung ums Leben gekommen sind. Ich habe keine Dinge preisgegeben, die Eure Ehre beschädigen könnten. Warum schmeckt Eure Dankbarkeit so giftig?"

languages.text: {n}L'inquisiteur interrompt sèchement le guerrier du Père de Tous :{/n} « J'espère ne pas avoir à vous rappeler que votre présence dans les Étendues n'est pas une faveur que vous me faites, mais bien le produit du remboursement d'une dette. À aucun moment je n'ai fait preuve d'arrogance lorsque j'ai ramené votre... frère égaré... sur Fenris. Je n'ai pas non plus exigé de rétribution pour tous ceux de mes serviteurs qui sont morts afin de le sauver, ni divulgué la moindre information qui aurait pu porter atteinte à votre honneur. Alors, pourquoi votre gratitude est-elle ainsi teintée de poison ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor dryly interrupts the Allfather's warrior:{/n} "Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt? I was not so haughty when I returned your... lost brother... to Fenris. I did not demand recompense for my faithful servants who died saving him. I kept secret those details that could have damaged your honour. Why, then, does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'inquisiteur interrompt sèchement le guerrier du Père de Tous :{/n} « Modérez votre ton, mon seigneur. J'espère ne pas avoir à vous rappeler que votre présence dans les Étendues n'est pas une faveur que vous me faites, mais bien le produit du remboursement d'une dette. À aucun moment je n'ai fait preuve d'arrogance lorsque j'ai ramené sur Fenris votre frère... égaré. Je n'ai pas non plus exigé de rétribution pour tous ceux de mes serviteurs qui sont morts afin de le sauver, ni divulgué la moindre information qui aurait pu porter atteinte à votre honneur. Alors pourquoi votre gratitude est-elle ainsi teintée de poison ? »

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu, Yücebaba'nın savaşçısına konuşma fırsatı vermiyor.{/n} "Enginlik'te bana iyilik etmek için değil, söz gereği hasıl olan borcunu ödemek amacıyla bulunduğunu hatırlatmalı mıyım? Senin o... Kayıp kardeşini... Fenris'e teslim ederken böyle böbürlenmiyordum ben. Onu kurtarmak uğruna ölen sadık hizmetkârlarım için tazminat talep etmedim. Onurunu zedeleyecek sırları sakladım. O hâlde minnetinin tadı neden böyle acı?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor dryly interrupts the Allfather's warrior:{/n} "Dare I remind you that your presence in the Expanse is not a favour to me, but the promised repayment of a debt? I was not so haughty when I returned your... lost brother... to Fenris. I did not demand recompense for my faithful servants who died saving him. I kept secret those details that could have damaged your honour. Why, then, does your gratitude taste so poisonous?"
